entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:01 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
